meanings.sent1: The antileak sealant kept the water from dripping out.
meanings.sent2: The antileak coating on the pipe ensured no water escaped.
meanings.sent3: The antileak solution worked like magic, no more drips!
meanings.sent4: Her umbrella acted as an antileak shield against the rain.
meanings.sent5: The antileak barrier was as strong as a fortress, holding back any leaks.

meanings.definition: A substance or device used to prevent leaks.
meanings.sent1: He applied the antileak to the pipe to avoid any spills.
meanings.sent2: The antileak was a lifesaver, keeping the tank secure.
meanings.sent3: The antileak gadget was like a superhero for the plumbing.
meanings.sent4: The antileak tape wrapped around the joint like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The antileak device was a guardian, ensuring no leaks could escape.
